sentences.en: artists from different cultural backgrounds found common ground.
sentences.cn: 有着不同文化背景的艺术家们找到了共同基础。

sentences.en: Boston Common
sentences.cn: 波士顿公地

sentences.en: Britain's common or garden house sparrow.
sentences.cn: 英国的普通家雀。

sentences.en: Common salt is made up of 40% sodium and 60% chloride.
sentences.cn: 食盐由40%的钠和60%的氯化物构成。

sentences.en: countries that share a common language
sentences.cn: 说同一种语言的国家

sentences.en: Deliveries are made by common carrier or van line.
sentences.cn: 货物运输采用普通货车或厢式货车。

sentences.en: Democracy might elevate the common man to a position of political superiority.
sentences.cn: 民主可能会让普通人升至政治上优越的位置。

sentences.en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentences.en: Einstein had the chutzpah to discard common sense and long-established theory.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦敢于抛弃常识和长期公认的理论。

sentences.en: Hallah wears the stylish tunic and pantaloons common in Kurdistan.
sentences.cn: 哈拉穿着库尔德斯坦常见的漂亮束腰上衣和马裤。

sentences.en: Hallucination is common in patients who have suffered damage to the brain.
sentences.cn: 脑部受损的病人常会产生幻觉。

sentences.en: He lacked any of the practical common sense essential in management.
sentences.cn: 管理方面基本的实用常识他一点也不懂。

sentences.en: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.cn: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: I think the only common denominator of success is hard work.
sentences.cn: 我认为取得成功唯一的共同要素是勤奋。

sentences.en: in common with other officers I had to undertake guard duties.
sentences.cn: 和其他军官一样，我不得不承担警戒任务。

sentences.en: it is time our elected officials stood up for the common good.
sentences.cn: 该是我们选出的公务员们维护公益的时候了。

sentences.en: Mild jaundice in the newborn is common and often clears without treatment.
sentences.cn: 新生儿有轻微的黄疸较为常见，经常不需要治疗就能自愈。

sentences.en: Moldavians and Romanians share a common language.
sentences.cn: 摩尔达维亚人和罗马尼亚人使用一种共同的语言。

sentences.en: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
sentences.cn: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

sentences.en: The countries of South Asia also share many common values.
sentences.cn: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

sentences.en: The oboe and the clarinet have got certain features in common.
sentences.cn: 双簧管和单簧管有些相似之处。

sentences.en: The scientific name for common salt is sodium chloride.
sentences.cn: 食盐的学名是氯化钠。

sentences.en: the two men had little in common.
sentences.cn: 这两个人没什么共同之处。

sentences.en: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.cn: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

sentences.en: They were conversing in German, their only common language.
sentences.cn: 他们正用德语交谈，这是他们唯一的共同语言。

words.tran_cn: 平民；自费学生；下议院议员

phrases.tran_cn: 共同事业；共同目标协会；偶然原因；普通原因
（冲突矛盾双方或多方承认的）共同立论基础
大多数人都知道的事，众所周知之事；常识
[化]常用名；普通名称；普通名词
(英，非正式)平常的，普通的，平凡的
有共同之处（或兴趣、特征）
一样，同样：与所有的都相同地
平易近人的能力；与普通人相处（或打动普通人）的能力

trans.tran_cn: 常见的，共有的，共同的，普通的，平凡的，众所周知的，粗俗的
trans.tran_en: happening often and to many people or in many places
a large area of open land in a town or village that people walk or play sport on
